entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
